channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Gate needs re-aligning - catch is on wrong side of post, 28th October
item.description:
This is stopping the gate from being closed securely and is swinging out towards passing cars risking damage to both.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sidcup By-pass, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping outside Wellington House on Arnside Street, 28th October
item.description:
Rubbish has been dumped all over the street and a lot of it is not in bin bags. This regularly happens and Southwark Council has done nothing about it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Arnside Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over flowing litter bin, 28th October
item.description:
On a regular basis the litter bin on the end of Anstridge Path where it meets Anstridge Road the bin is repeatedly over flowing Is it possible for this to be emptied regularly and also If an additional bin is added to the middle of Anstridge Path???
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 119, Anstridge Road, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 100cm pole 5 along the road, 28th October
item.description:
I’m writing to raise urgent concern about the numerous potholes along Hartslock Drive (SE2 9UX) — the section with Oakenholt House at the end, not the road near the school. The condition of the road has become hazardous; several deep potholes have already caused damage to my car and forced me to drive unsafely to avoid them. I urge the council to inspect and repair this stretch of road as soon as possible before further damage or accidents occur. Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartslock Drive, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Corner of Glenbow Road and Goudhurst Road, 28th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Goudhurst Road, Downham, London

item.description:

item.title: Abandoned car not moved 1 year., 28th October
item.description:
This car has been here for 1 year and not moved. It is taking up valuable parking spaces for residents. It has damage to it which has been done since it has been left there and no one has attended it which is why I believe it to be abandoned.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charminster Road, Chinbrook, London
Report on FixMyStreet

On lynmouth Road, opposite Quantock House, black bike tied up to a pole
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lynmouth Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Continuous traffic blockage on Lynmouth Road, 28th October
item.description:
There is always traffic from both sides on Lynmouth Road. Cars on both sides honk and beep so that one side can reverse for them to go through. Our cars have gotten damaged and dented from road being to narrow and no space for 2 way traffic. Should be 1way
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Darenth Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken road surface, 28th October
item.description:
Road surface at junction of Sherwood Park Avenue & Harcourt Avenue broken and very deep. Riding cycle my wheels went down and very nearly got thrown in path of car. Is very dangerous for cyclists
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 240, Sherwood Park Avenue, Blendon, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A bag of rubbish dumped, 28th October
item.description:
The street has been finally cleaned after two months of no street cleaning and the cleaner left a bag of rubbish on the pavement a week ago. It still has not been collected and it is almost ripped. Please remove asap. Thank you!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Theydon Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Piss in plastic bags, 28th October
